com.cloudera.oryx.lambda.serving

Class InMemoryRealm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleBase
      • org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleMBeanBase
        • org.apache.catalina.realm.RealmBase
          • com.cloudera.oryx.lambda.serving.InMemoryRealm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MBeanRegistration, org.apache.catalina.JmxEnabled, org.apache.catalina.Lifecycle, org.apache.catalina.Realm

    public final class InMemoryRealm
extends org.apache.catalina.realm.RealmBase
    Adapted from Tomcat's MemoryRealm. This implementation of RealmBase lets you add users programmatically to an in-memory store.
